name: c763bdde-a35f-5c97-abbf-dbd7b71d6b89
notes:
CSTParser is a multi-document discourse parser. Based on machine learning techniques and hand-crafted rules, the system 
identifies a set of relations predicted by CST (Cross-document Structure Theory) among sentences of different texts on the same topic.
title: CSTParser
